page.title: 11Gt.Asby Ghost Story
page.content:
Supernatural
This area of old Westmorland is steeped in tales of the supernatural,but the only authenticated haunting was in Asby Vicarage. A presence was often felt, and a rather shepeless form, thought to be female, had been seen on several occasions. This was rather disturbing to the residents and felt to be malign, so an exorcism was held about a decade ago and nothing has been seen, felt or heard since. The country-wide "black dog" legend appears in this area as being headless and silent, a portent of the seer's death. Superstition is very strong among the older residents, especially where their animals are concerned.
